Content:
Love this app.  Works great.  
Would be nice to be able to send breakdown to each person so they can see exactly what they are paying for.  
Also, right now I screenshot the All Up breakdown and text it to the group. Would be nice to be able to send that directly without doing a screenshot.

Overall think this is an awesome app- the scanning works well, the ability to break apart individual items is a great feature, and overall this saves me so much time as the designated paying and bill splitting friend.  BUT I’ve tried multiple times and can’t get the Venmo integration to connect. It opens Venmo and then I when I click allow nothing happens.
I used to use another app that you had to add the items manually, and ever since I discover this once I hadn’t look back. User friendly!!!
love the ability to split items into different portions and across different people
Works great and you don’t have to invite people to the app! Definite time and friendship saver.

I just used it for 13 people at a kbbq restaurant where we split the table into 2 but had everything on one bill PLUS a birthday where we split their cost between everyone. A nightmare of a situation but Tab saved me.
This app use to work great now I’m having the constant issue where new bill photographs time out and won’t read

This application is amazing! I recommend it to everyone I can. They are just always shocked. Some updates are needed to the app though. The layout doesn’t fit on my iPhones screen and buttons are cut off. 

Also having trouble uploading receipts from my library for splitting. Says check my data. But I tried over both wifi and celular and still same issue. No problem when uploading directly from the camera lens. 

I’m still gonna give this app a 5 because it’s amazing. Hope you have the time to fix some of these bugs :)
One of the best UX/UI experiences I’ve ever had with an app, everyone needs to have this app.

I discovered the tab app many years ago and haven’t stopped singing it’s praises since. Best way to take care of splitting the bill without too much extra effort. It’s specific, exact and flexible when some people shared and others didn’t. A Godsend!
poppa
My friends are always impressed by this app’s capabilities. I recommend it to everyone. It just works.
Tab is a necessity for your sanity to just enjoy dining in large groups again, because PTMD is real
Super helpful, quick to calculate the bill for a group of people

Great app concept but there are some bugs that make it difficult to use at times:

1. Sometimes the addition isnt correct - when gratuity is included in the bill it sometimes adds it twice or produces an incorrect total. 

2. App doesn’t work without internet connection… not sure why - to me it functions like an advanced calculator.

This app is amazing!! It’s literally everything I ever wanted in a bill splitting app!!!! OCR photo scanning, Venmo integration, splitting with your friends… it’s great!! Seriously, if you ever go out to eat with friends and split the bill, get this app!
Added 300$ to the bill for an item that didn’t exist.

Greatest, most functional app for eating out or doing activities with friends. Makes it so insanely easy to know who owes how much; no more having to awkwardly request a restaurant split the bill 10 ways.

The photo scanner makes it super easy, the receipt items & tax are always accurate. Plus, you can save the receipts so can always access them again if needed. Don’t know what I’d do without this
Thank you for your prompt response! I would pay for this app :)
I wasn’t using this app too much last year for “reasons” but now that things are reopening I’ve come back to using it. Happy to report it’s still as good as ever!
Very convenient when it works but it will stop working and not load a receipt at random times. Full connection to WiFi and everything.

Love this app and think it's the best thing to make splitting checks painless and fair. It even let's you split a single line item across multiple people - which I just figured out. I wish they'd consider a more intuitive UX for this - like clicking on the item for it to pop-up with a list of everyone on the bill and selecting all those that it applied to. That said, it ROCKS and getting the ability to send the results of everything over text without anyone having to download the app gets rid of any concerns about if you split the bill correctly. Great job - would love to see this sold as a feature to a payment company like Venmo!

It was seamless and intuitive from start to finish. The only issues were with the OCR not reading some items, and the tip being captured as “18” from the line “18%” instead of the actual amount. Easy things to fix on my end (and I know OCR isn’t perfect) and easily still 5 stars.

This is a good start because this app is so needed. However I think there are some areas for improvement that are needed before I use it full time. For example, there isn’t (or I haven’t figured out) how to unequally share a multiple quantity item. I.e. if the table bought 6 sodas total, but one friend got 3, you got 2, and another friend got 1, there is no way to split the bill like that. I wish the people were color coded as well, so you could quickly see who was what on the bill.
The text is recognized about 80% of the time but the manual fixes to the bill is easy. Recommend!!
I’ve been using Tab for years and it’s a godsend when going out with groups! Super easy to use and convenient! Really the best bill-splitter out here so far.
I need more apps like this in my life.

Ever since my friends have shown me the Tab app, it’s made large group outings at restaurants so much easier. I have used it multiple times now and until last night, have not had any problems. Unfortunately after scanning my receipt, the app did not pick up on the tax amount listed on the receipt, and instead listed it as $0. I understand that sometimes the text may be hard to recognize on receipts, but please add a manual edit option to the tax/tip screen in case any of the amounts need to be modified.

Other than that, overall amazing and helpful app!
This app is a life saver every time I head out with my friends. Fully featured and super convenient, highly recommended!
This is the most useful app ever
Best app ever! makes life easy for your group and for the server. We would use this for our group of 19 and it was amazing! connect through venmo so everyone pays right then!

I love this app. So good. Idk why it has so little reviews it’s so great. You can take a pic or upload one of a receipt, you don’t have to manually input meals. And there are name tags for people who shared meals and there’s even a birthday tag if it’s someone’s birthday and they don’t have to pay. THE BEST - we over complicated everything trying to manually calculate what this app does so easily.
Makes going out in giant groups simple
Whenever I use Tab in a group setting, I get a million questions. It’s such a great app, and so handy!
THIS IS THE BEST APP TO EVER EXIST. All my friends have it and use is regularly, could not exist without Tab!
This app is super great! I think one extra thing that would give it 5 stars would be the ability to send the share code via text to the people on the bill.
Take a photo and everyone can tab and pay. Awesome
Simplified our girls trip weekend so much! Highly recommend for large groups
This is an app that when people see its simplicity and power, they all say Wow!

This app has saved me so much time at the end of large group meals. Knowing I have this app, I’ll always take the credit card points in exchange for splitting the bill since it’s so easy. I’ve also saved my friend $30 by noticing an Included Tip on my Tab bill, he had no idea it was there.

This app makes splitting the bill so much easier, it is incredibly well implemented and the OCR works surprisingly well. Haven’t got the Venmo implementation to work properly for myself, but that’s not a big deal. Thanks a lot for maintaining this app, it deserves a lot more users then he currently has.
I have told everyone about this. I worked at a restaurant and told all my customers. Such a great concept and super easy to use
One you learn to use it, it is flawless
This makes me what to go to brunch all the time

This app had bugs when I first downloaded it, but it’s actually perfect now. It’s great for large families or friend groups that split the bill, but it’s PERFECT for groups that have a mix of drinkers and non-drinkers.
So easy.

The image processing is the main attraction. The accuracy of extracting itemized items is decent. Could be better, although I realize that's not an easy task. The app may mistakes items with the word 'tips' in it (e.g. S-tips/steak tips) as included tips and so it will not appear in the list of items. Deleting the included tips should automatically add this misinterpreted item to the list, but it doesn't. It has to be entered manually. 
I'd like to see the tax displayed as a percentage as well. Because I know the tax in my area is 7%, I'd quickly know if the list of items is wrong. I also would like to see a pre/post tax option to for tip calculations.
Really wish there was functionality to spilt the cost of items in this app. Like when my friends all share apps. I’m going to delete this app until this functionality is included.
See above

I'm really hoping the developers read this! Just installed it today and used it for grocery shopping, not the most intended thing but it worked out well! Then I ran it through say ordering take out from delivery or uber eats and that's where it falls short just barely. It would be fantastic to have a flat fee option near the end that gets split equally among everyone for things like service fees or delivery fees. This fee shouldn't be taxed or influence it. I think once that gets added the app will be perfect to use In restaurants and for delivery services with friends. Seems like a perfect fit for this cpvid influenced world.
